DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety, tolerability, PK and PD of URC102 in healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1 Study(Additional) of URC102 in Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Tolerability, safety, and pharmacokinetics (PK) of URC102 will be assessed after 7-day repeated oral dose in healthy adult Korean males. In addition, pharmacodynamic (PD) response of blood and urinary uric acid levels will be assessed.
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteers Participated in other clinical study within past 3 months prior to receiving an IP administration
